strIntroduction: What You'll Do Soar above the beautiful Kaibab National Forest in the Grand Canyon on a scenic helicopter flight See the Painted Desert and the Desert View Watchtower, designed by the Hopi Indians View Marble Canyon and Point Imperial as you fly through the canyon and climb above the North Rim Fly south through the Dragon Corridor, the widest and deepest part of the canyon Enjoy a memorable 45-minute flight through the Grand Canyon Take advantage of the frequent and convenient daily flight times Enjoy an all-inclusive tour with no added fees Soar above the beautiful Kaibab National Forest in the Grand Canyon on a scenic helicopter flight See the Painted Desert and the Desert View Watchtower, designed by the Hopi Indians View Marble Canyon and Point Imperial as you fly through the canyon and climb above the North Rim Fly south through the Dragon Corridor, the widest and deepest part of the canyon Enjoy a memorable 45-minute flight through the Grand Canyon Take advantage of the frequent and convenient daily flight times Enjoy an all-inclusive tour with no added fees Soar above the beautiful Kaibab National Forest in the Grand Canyon on a scenic helicopter flight See the Painted Desert and the Desert View Watchtower, designed by the Hopi Indians View Marble Canyon and Point Imperial as you fly through the canyon and climb above the North Rim Fly south through the Dragon Corridor, the widest and deepest part of the canyon Enjoy a memorable 45-minute flight through the Grand Canyon Take advantage of the frequent and convenient daily flight times Enjoy an all-inclusive tour with no added fees
